titleStmt.title: Animaduersions vpon M. Seldens History of tithes, and his reuievv thereof before which (in lieu of the two first chapters purposely pretermitted) is premised a catalogue of seuenty two authours, before the yeere 1215. Maintaining the ius diuinum of tythes or more, to be payd to the priesthood vnder the Gospell: by Richard Tillesley Doctor in Diuinity, and archdeacon of Rochester.
titleStmt.author: Tillesley, Richard, 1582-1621.

titleStmt.title: Animaduersions vpon M. Seldens History of tithes, and his reuievv thereof before which (in lieu of the two first chapters purposely pretermitted) is premised a catalogue of seuenty two authours, before the yeere 1215. Maintaining the ius diuinum of tythes or more, to be payd to the priesthood vnder the Gospell: by Richard Tillesley Doctor in Diuinity, and archdeacon of Rochester.
titleStmt.author: Tillesley, Richard, 1582-1621.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for a fleuron in a mortised ornament.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
